Arigatou. =)

What I think Narrator is trying to say, is that you can't have a 
character more powerful than other characters, that would be unfair 
to all the other RPers who are following the rules. That way it 
depends on the RPing skills of the RPers and such. There are some 
characters that are more powerful than other characters. Those 
characters are called gestalts. =) Leaders are also more powerful,  
but powerful or not, they can be taken down. Being overwhelmed 7 to 
1 = a certain fate known as defeat.

Hottie, I'd appreicate if you emailed me privately about any 
questions you have, instead of posting one line OOC messages to the 
group. They are just useless clutter to 99% of the RPG and are best 
kept to private email. Did you read the poll regarding the 
moderation of Dewboy for 5 days regarding OOC posting infractions? I 
hate to threaten, but it's the only way to get the point across 
sometimes. If you keep posting OOC messages, there will be a poll 
like that for you. Dewboy and I both have private addresses, if you 
feel like emailing either of us, which are located in each one of 
our posts, and in the members section. Otherwise, you could get an 
instant messenger like YahooMessenger, MSN, ICQ, etc and use it to 
talk to people. This might seem harsh, but you have been told at 
least once to stop posting OOC messages.

I'm not sure who's posting for the Chivitron shields, but having 
taken the damage that they have, I'm not sure how long they will be 
standing. Wasn't Gunthers the one who was supposed to be covering it?

One last thing, IF the Chivitron base has shields, are bots able to 
walk through them? I can't remember.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Narrator" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Thanks, Jeff, I should never have doubted your abilities as a 
moderator. Oh, and Hottie? You can make your characters be a bit 
stronger if you want to, until the Council catch you, but then I can 
just say that my guys are stronger than yours. So that means you 
can't do that. Was that confusing? I'm confused.
> 
> BIC: Ransack and Venom each move apart from each other, 
successfully avoiding the 2 foot in diameter fireballs. They could 
see Apocalypse perfectly. Venom fired a poison stream at Apocalypse. 
Ransack fired an electrical bolt at Apocalypse...
